Package kaitech.controller

Class RecordsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kaitech.controller.RecordsController
  • public class RecordsController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for the records screen, which shows a list of sales records, which may span over several pages. Sales may be edited provided the user has logged in.
